effect.red-blue: Switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon selected at random. Wild battles end immediately. Doesn’t affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.
effect.yellow: Switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon selected at random. Wild battles end immediately. Doesn’t affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.
effect.red-green-japan: Switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon selected at random. Wild battles end immediately. Doesn’t affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.
effect.blue-japan: Switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon selected at random. Wild battles end immediately. Doesn’t affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.

short_effect.red-blue: Immediately ends wild battles. Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.
short_effect.yellow: Immediately ends wild battles. Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.
short_effect.red-green-japan: Immediately ends wild battles. Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.
short_effect.blue-japan: Immediately ends wild battles. Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.
